citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:55 AM on
05-Sep-19.
Stopped near the animal housing facility at 10:55 AM and called the licensee. Texted the licensee. Waited 50
minutes. Drove to the licensees residence and arrived at 12:17 PM. The front gate was secured so I yelled hello
twice. I went back to my vehicle and honked my horn twice. No one came out of the house.
Additional Inspectors
O Malley Justine, Veterinary Medical Officer

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:55 AM on
05-Sep-19.
Stopped near the animal housing facility at 10:55 AM and called the licensee.  Texted the licensee.  Waited 50
minutes.  Drove to the licensees residence and arrived at 12:17 PM.  The front gate was secured so I yelled hello
twice.  I went back to my vehicle and honked my horn twice.  No one came out of the house.
Additional Inspectors
O Malley Justine, Veterinary Medical Officer
